title: hotreload fails hard when adding extensions with vscode (any IDE?) open
body:
### Describe the bug

```
code .
```

in vscode terminal 1:

```
quarkus create app redhattour
cd redhattour
quarkus dev
```

in vscode terminal 2:

```
quarkus ext add jdbc-postgres
quarkus ext add hibernate-orm-panache
```
